name: Yahoo Mail Beautification (Ad-Free)
description: Remove the annoying frosted container from Yahoo Mail, beautifying it to show the gorgeous background image in your selected theme.  Also fixes the horizontal scaling issue in Ymail.
additional_info:
Note: Use this version with an adblocker or other styles for hiding ads, otherwise ads will display over the message list.  To use this style without ad blocking, go here: https://userstyles.org/styles/106250/yahoo-mail-beautification

v0.0.3
Created by Jordan Hawker
www.JordanHawker.com

Release Notes:

v0.0.3 -
Hide ad div above mail list

v0.0.2 -
Fix horizontal scaling to get rid of useless white space on the right-hand side (should work with or without AdBlock)

v0.0.1 -
Hide frosted container
